docs.text: AM3DB: 3D Atom Mapping Database for chemical kinetics transition state searches Documentation : https://DanaResearchGroup.github.io/AM3DB/ Source Code : https://github.com/DanaResearchGroup/AM3DB/ General ¶ AM3DB is a database for storing 3D atom-maps of chemical reactions. Requirements ¶ Python 3.7+ AM3DB stands on the shoulders of giants: RMG for model generation. ARC for automating electronic structure calculations. License ¶ This project is licensed under the terms of the MIT license.

docs.text: AM3DB is a database for storing 3D atom-maps of chemical reactions.

docs.text: How to cite ¶ Text form: R. Cohen, A. Grinberg Dana, AM3DB: 3D Atom Mapping Database for chemical kinetics transition state searches, version 0.1.0, source code: https://github.com/DanaResearchGroup/AM3DB LaTeX form: @misc{T3, author = {R. Cohen, A. Grinberg Dana}, title = {AM3DB: 3D Atom Mapping Database for chemical kinetics transition state searches, Version 0.1.0}, year = {2022}, howpublished = {\url{https://github.com/DanaResearchGroup/AM3DB}}, }
